DOC.brief_summary: To see Disease Free Survival ( DFS ) improve complete surgical resection liver metastasis ( R0 ) follow chemotherapy CPT-11 5-FU/FA FOLFIRI regimen , compare 5-FU/FA alone .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Irinotecan 5 FU/FA To 5-FU/FA After Resection Of Liver Metastases For Colorectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically proven adenocarcinoma colon rectum complete resection primary tumour . Complete surgical resection ( R0 ) liver metastasis ( e ) within minimum 3 week , maximum 8 week prior first study treatment infusion .
